name: PentaZorg
description:
PentaZorg is an intense arcade bullet hell that is quite difficult to describe in a single sentence.


Hit songs from Gunk The Janitor and THE RAT!


5 Unique visual aesthetics to play with the vibe you want!


300+ danger patterns!


You are the grey square,
red squares will kill you,
black squares let you know where the danger will be,
going over one side of the screen will bring you to the opposite side of the screen,
pressing space will bring forth the next frame of danger,
CHASE THE HIGHEST SCORE!
